author: hwright
msg: Really fix the ra_svn compatibility issue for 'svn log -g'.  Introduce a new
format character, 'B', which can be used to specify an optional boolean
value.  Use this value for the optional include-merged-revisions paramater.
SVN_RA_SVN_UNSPECIFIED_NUMBER for an absent optional 'B' value.
(log_cmd): Use 'B' to parse the optional binary value, and give the
argument a default value of FALSE if it isn't present.

author: hwright
msg: Revert r25242 in preparation for a more complete fix to the 'svn log -g'

author: sussman
msg: Have 'svn merge' send a notification for each revision range merged.
(svn_wc_notify_t):  new 'merge_range' field to describe range being merged.
(svn_wc_create_notify):  have constructor explicitly NULL new field.
also, use a subpool in the ranges loop.
(notify):  print the merge_begin notification, describe range being merged.
(merge_notify_line):  new utility func to return expected output line
Use utility func anywhere we call 'merge' via run_and_verify_svn().
Use utility func anywhere we call 'merge' via run_and_verify_svn().
